title: 2014 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 42)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2014 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

I spent a little time last night organizing more of this music collection.  It really is a work in progress that requires constant ongoing effort, as it continues to grow daily.  But I ran across a situation where I no longer had a 2014 album which I had previously shared here a couple of months ago.  And the easiest way for me to reacquire that title was to jump onto the bundle, and get it that way.

Although the bundle was already a couple of months old, I was pleasantly surprised to see how many seeders were still sharing it.  It took mere minutes to download and complete my missing album.  But even better yet, I had three or four other people connected to me, downloading it from me just as fast as I was able to download it from others.  So it really was nice to know something we shared amongst ourselves two months ago, music many of us have perhaps moved on from, is still drawing interest by downloaders today.

On that note, 911ij has been trying to mirror all of these bundles onto usenet for those Usenet Users to enjoy.  Last I heard, he's gotten all 41 bundles from 2014, all 57 bundles from 2013, and he's currently working on the 55 bundles we shared back in 2012.  He's then got to work on 2011.  Unfortunately once I share a bundle, I no longer leave the music in bundle format.  And as time passes, I sometimes reacquire certain albums, meaning it's almost impossible for me to reseed older bundles.  But if any of you are able to help him out in his efforts, it would be greatly appreciated.

CONTEMPORARY: Alastair Wilde, For The Fatherless, Jalisa Faye, Joe Cirafici, Kathryn Scott, Louise B Calixte, Raymond Gregory.  POP: The Barnes Project, Irma, Landry Cantrell.  PRAISE & WORSHIP: Beth Croft, High Street Worship, ICF Worship, Isla Vista Worship, Sovereign Grace.  JAZZ: Cory Henry.  R&B: David Young.  GOSPEL: EQ, Mighty Clouds Of Joy.  HIP-HOP/RAP: Grand Mill, J-Glles Son, Kiesh, Lady Zion, Pierre Raphael F, Shai Linne, V.O.P, Victor Mariachi.  ROCK: Jordan Marcotte, Michael James Band, The Roasters.  ALTERNATIVE: Mr Ekow.  INDIE: Tori Harris.

There are 32 titles being offered in today's bundle, including...

 * Alastair Wilde - 2014 - Lanterns
 * Barnes Project, The - 2014 - Let You Go - Single
 * Beth Croft - 2014 - Rule In My Heart
 * Cory Henry - 2014 - First Steps
 * David Young - 2014 - David Young Again EP
 * EQ - 2014 - The 8 Album
 * For The Fatherless - 2014 - For The Fatherless
 * Grand Mill - 2014 - TMV2
 * High Street Worship - 2014 - Live
 * ICF Worship - 2014 - Catching Fire
 * Irma - 2014 - Faces
 * Isla Vista Worship - 2014 - Isla Vista Worship
 * J-Glles Son - 2014 - Employed By The King
 * Jalisa Faye - 2014 - The Prologue EP
 * Joe Cirafici - 2014 - Healed And Whole
 * Jordan Marcotte - 2014 - Leaning
 * Kathryn Scott - 2014 - Sing On The Battlefield - Single
 * Kiesh - 2014 - No More Waiting EP
 * Lady Zion - 2014 - No Turning Back
 * Landry Cantrell - 2014 - Landry Cantrell
 * Louise B Calixte - 2014 - This World Is Not My Home
 * Michael James Band - 2014 - The Anthem Of A Desperate Heart EP
 * Mighty Clouds Of Joy - 2014 - Best Of The Mighty Clouds Of Joy
 * Mr Ekow - 2014 - Ekow Chamber
 * Pierre Raphael F - 2014 - Never Wanted Everything EP
 * Raymond Gregory - 2014 - All Things Wonderful EP
 * Roasters, The - 2014 - Aftertaste
 * Shai Linne - 2014 - Lyrical Theology Pt 1 Theology - Instrumentals
 * Sovereign Grace - 2014 - Three Decades Of Songs For The Church
 * Tori Harris - 2014 - Sweet Dolor EP
 * V.O.P - 2014 - The ReUp
 * Victor Mariachi - 2014 - A Death From Bethlehem

Blessings,
TorrentTracts, August 2014
